name: Sweaty Black Chameleons - Street Fighter
description:
This is an incomplete project.

Please read the controls before playing!

Menu Options

Play takes you to the game framework.

Art Assets takes you to a mock up of a fight using assets made by our team. These were unable to be implemented due to a lack of rigging, animations and textures.

Controls takes you to the controls screen.

Team Members:

Alex Skinner (UP883772) - Programmer and project lead

Alex Colmer (UP883681) - UI programmer

Callun Brown (UP867938) - Programmer

Andrew McIntyre (UP898579) - Artist (Robot)

Charlie Williams (UP900884) - Artist (Sumo)

Resources Used:

This is a Street Fighter game made using the tutorial by Miguel Escalera with his assets provided here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ7yoKGP5vkTqxvZgDwQ6XRKtGcw6A4bQ
